author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This expands proxy and tunneling support for confdb scripts for 12_5


#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40454
title: Expanding HLT Configuration Proxy Support and Adding Tunnel Support : 12_5
